other_title: とんでも戦士ムテキング (Japanese)
plot: Twelve-year-old Linn Youki loyally supported his father when the world laughed at his dad, because his father was a scientist whom said the Earth was in outer space. Linn later met up with Takoro, the strange criminal from another world.
opening_theme: "Roller Hero Muteking" by Ichirou Mizuki & Feel Free
